s0.title: Printing I love Computer Science!
s0.instructions: Construct a program that prints out I, love and Computer Science on separate lines.

s1.title: Creating a function that prints hello world
s1.instructions: Construct a program that prints out Hello functions.

s2.title: Creating a function that distinguishes if true or false
s2.instructions: Construct a function by drag&dropping and reordering lines from the left to the right.The constructed function should return True if the parameter is True and return False otherwise.
